title: Hyperthermia and biological investigation of a novel magnetic nanobiocomposite based on acacia gum-silk fibroin hydrogel embedded with poly vinyl alcohol
content:
Publication date: Available online 12 October 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Zeinab Pajoum, Hooman Aghamirza Moghim Aliabadi, Adibeh Mohammadi, Zahra Sadat, Amir Kashtiaray, Milad Salimi Bani, Mohammad Shahiri, Mohammad Mahdavi, Reza Eivazzadeh-Keihan, Ali Maleki, Majid M. Heravi
